poth puwathrajya sammana dinu prawina lekhaka saha jyeshta madhyawedi somawira senanayaka mahatha liyu ‘pancha waruna’ aluthma nawakathawa me masa 28 wanida angaharuwada ude 10.00 ta kolambaa maradane, dayawansha jayakodi saha samagamaye nawa poth pradarshanagaraye di dorata wadi.nawakatha kalawe wyaktha angayak wana rupanayata mul thana dena ‘pancha waruna’ shri lankawe ingrisi palanaye awasan bhagaye samanya minisunge jiwitha da samaja aragalaya da uddamaya da tharunyaya saha sampradayika chinthanaya athara gatuma da wishayaya kara gani.karthru - baddegama wimalawansha nayaka sthawiramila - ru. 350prakashanaya - samayawardhana pothhalabauddha sahithyaye aarambhaye sita bauddha sahithyaya diyunuwata pathwu aakarayath me kruthiyen penwa di atha.

↑ 1989 sita 1996 dakwa siayiee loka thathu gatha mul prakashanayanhi, eja sampurna bhumi pramanaya layisthu gatha kara thibune 9,372,610 kimi² lesini (bhumiya + abhyanthara jala pradesha pamani). 1997 di layisthugatha kara thibu bhumi pramanaya 9,629,091 kimi² dakwa wenas wu athara (maha wil pradeshaya saha weralashritha jala pradeshayan ek kerini), 2004 di 9,631,418 kimi² dakwada, 2006 di 9,631,420 kimi² dakwada, saha 2007 di 9,826,630 kimi² dakwada wenas wini (deshabhumika jalathalayan ekkerini).
